== Ubuntu Touch OTA-15 Update ==

Security maintenance update including only important security fixes.

=== Image numbers ===

As each channel and device has separate versioning, the following list shows the respective image numbers corresponding to the released update:

* BQ Aquaris E4.5 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - '''krillin''': '''#37'''
* BQ Aquaris E5 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - '''vegetahd''': '''#17'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - '''generic''': '''#20'''
* BQ Aquaris M10 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - '''frieza''': '''#8'''
* BQ Aquaris M10 HD : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - '''cooler''': '''#8'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - '''generic''': '''#4'''
* Nexus 4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - '''mako''': '''#35'''
* Meizu MX4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.en - '''arale''': '''#17'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.en - '''generic''': '''#6'''
* Meizu PRO 5: ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.en - '''turbo''': '''#7'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.en - '''generic''': '''#4'''
* Meizu MX4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.zh - '''arale''': '''#13'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.zh - '''generic''': '''#6'''
* Meizu PRO 5: ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.zh - '''turbo''': '''#7'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.zh - '''generic''': '''#4'''
* Nexus 4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - '''mako''': '''#35'''
* Nexus 7 : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - '''flo''': '''#13'''
* Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - '''generic''': '''#23'''
* Emulator (x86) : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - '''generic_x86''': '''#23'''

On a device, this "image number" is shown as the "OS build number" in '''System Settings''' > '''About this phone''' > '''OS'''.

=== Overview of changes ===

This list is only a highlight of the few changes available in this update. 

==== Framework versions ====

No change in framework versions.

==== Bugfixes ====

* Update to latest oxide-qt (1.19.7)
* Fixes to various issues regarding accessing certain webpages
* Fix front camera inverted on vegeta
* Fix tablet suspending while playing audio or video on the webbrowser
